Click on the "bilibili" app icon to open the application.
Click "动态" to navigate to the "Dynamic" page.
Click the "Login" button to access the login interface.
Click the checkbox labeled “我已阅读并同意用户协议和隐私政策，未注册绑定的手机号验证成功后将自动注册”.
Enter '8576' into the verification code field.
Click the checkbox to agree to the user agreement and privacy policy.
Click "验证登录" to log in to the account.
